metadata.description: Marketplace for execution plan mode plugins, enabling Claude to proactively evaluate and mention which skills, agents, and MCP servers will be used during plan mode.

plugins.name: skilled-execution-plan-mode
plugins.description: Toggle skilled execution plan mode to have Claude evaluate and mention which skills will be used during planning. Provides /skilled-plan-on and /skilled-plan-off commands with persistent configuration.

plugins.name: agent-execution-plan-mode
plugins.description: Toggle agent execution plan mode to have Claude evaluate and mention which agents will be useful during planning. Provides /agent-plan-on and /agent-plan-off commands with persistent configuration.

plugins.name: mcp-execution-plan-mode
plugins.description: Toggle MCP execution plan mode to have Claude evaluate and mention which MCP servers will be useful during planning. Provides /mcp-plan-on and /mcp-plan-off commands with persistent configuration.
